mapper.select: SELECT id,free_num,free_context, create_date,update_date,view_rate, free_category,free_like,title FROM free_board WHERE free_like='N' ORDER BY free_num desc
SELECT id,free_num,free_context, create_date,update_date,view_rate, free_category,free_like,title FROM free_board where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO free_board (id, free_num, free_context, create_date, update_date, view_rate, free_category,free_like, title) VALUES (#{id},seq_free_board.nextval,#{freeContext}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{viewRate}, #{freeCategory},#{freeLike},#{title}
